name: Yoda Sour
preparation:
Inspired by the diminutive Jedi Master, this simple Pisco Sour recipe packs a serious punch with its double dose of green thanks to matcha and absinthe. Love it, you will.

Coat the inside of a chilled coupe with 3 sprays of absinthe, discarding any excess, and set aside.

Add all the remaining ingredients into a shaker and dry-shake (no ice).

Fill the shaker with ice, and shake again until well-chilled.

Strain into the prepared coupe.

Sift matcha over a Yoda stencil to garnish.
